name: BoxBlock (abeirne88)
description:
Have you ever wondered why your package takes so long to deliver ? This simple platform game about a delivery box that takes a journey to get to the doorstep, travelling many levels and meeting enemy's with box cutters and obstacles in its way that will make the player respawn.

This Game was made with Game Maker Studios as a project for school. It was made from inspiration from Getting over it with Bennett Foddy, the game is complete but may have small bugs, I will work on it if I can.

This is my first game and it was made in 4 days, feedback is appreciated.
